Package io.atlasmap.api

Interface AtlasContextFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAtlasContextFactory
public interface AtlasContextFactory
The factory class for AtlasContext and AtlasMap services. Although AtlasContext could be created from a plain mapping definition JSON file, it should be limited to test purpose only. The ADM archive file contains DataSource metadata and some modules require it to achieve some features.

    • createContext

      AtlasContext createContext(File atlasMappingFile) throws AtlasException
      Creates AtlasContext from mapping definition JSON file. This is for test purpose only. Instead, use createContext(Format, InputStream) with an ADM archive file.
      Parameters:
      atlasMappingFile - mapping definition JSON file
      Returns:
      AtlasContext
      Throws:
      AtlasException - unexpected error

    • createContext

      Parameters:
      atlasMappingUri - mapping definition JSON file
      Returns:
      AtlasContext
      Throws:
      AtlasException - unexpected error

    • createContext

      AtlasContext createContext(AtlasContextFactory.Format format, InputStream atlasMappingStream) throws AtlasException
      Creates AtlasContext. Use AtlasContextFactory.Format.ADM other than for a simple test.
      Parameters:
      format - mapping defiition format
      atlasMappingStream - ADM archive file or mapping definition JSON file
      Returns:
      AtlasContext
      Throws:
      AtlasException - unexpected error
